name: CMGT_PortalPage_Home
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!portalConfig: rule!CMGT_INT_GET_PortalConfig(locale: "en_US"),
  local!brandingMap: local!portalConfig.result.body.brandingMap,
  local!stampScheme: touniformstring(
    split(local!brandingMap.StampSchemeA, ",")
  ),
  local!portalUrl: local!portalConfig.result.body.urlInfo.portalPath,
  local!portalPages: {
    a!map(
      pageType: "SubmitCase",
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:dccad5ee-f64c-4507-9f7a-0a57b8155d3a",
      link: local!portalUrl & "/page/" & cons!CMGT_PORTAL_TXT_SUBMIT_A_CASE_URL_STUB,
      icon: "clipboard-list",
      backgroundColor: local!stampScheme[1],
      description: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:b68420b6-9ec8-4f66-a7ea-0a916d8e9ef0"
    ),
    a!map(
      pageType: "CheckStatus",
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:5d0874b1-27e8-40bd-ada7-f9b09e8cd0be",
      link: local!portalUrl & "/page/" & cons!CMGT_PORTAL_TXT_CHECK_STATUS_URL_STUB,
      icon: "tasks-alt",
      backgroundColor: local!stampScheme[2],
      description: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:f9123fdf-add9-4621-91ed-cb5fb40964b8"
    ),
    a!map(
      pageType: "SignUp",
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:624d9976-905d-4e2a-8b27-39a4749a5f53",
      link: local!portalUrl & "/page/" & cons!CMGT_SELF_TXT_SIGN_UP_PORTAL_URL_STUB,
      icon: "user-plus",
      backgroundColor: local!stampScheme[3],
      description: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0c575c22-89c1-4d0a-8c5d-0b86886a9663"
    ),
    /*Any new pages should be added here*/

  },
  rule!CMGT_PortalInterface_HeaderLayout(
    title: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:e40fc4b2-4a46-46bb-aa7d-d0c40de42455",
    contents: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headingField"(
        text: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:05d30528-dd7b-41f9-916a-3df09634ff66",
        color: local!brandingMap.StandardTextColor,
        align: "CENTER",
        size: local!brandingMap.H2Size,
        fontWeight: local!brandingMap.H2Weight,
        marginAbove: "LESS",
        marginBelow: "LESS"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
        columns: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(width: "EXTRA_NARROW"),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
            contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardGroupLayout"(
              cards: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                items: local!portalPages,
                expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
                  contents: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_stampField"(
                      icon: fv!item.icon,
                      backgroundColor: fv!item.backgroundColor,
                      shape: local!brandingMap.StandardStampShape,
                      size: "TINY",
                      contentColor: local!brandingMap.WhiteColor
                    ),
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headingField"(
                      text: fv!item.label,
                      color: local!brandingMap.StandardTextColor,
                      size: local!brandingMap.H2Size,
                      fontWeight: local!brandingMap.H2Weight,
                      marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS"
                    ),
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                      label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Description"),
                      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                      value: {
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                          text: fv!item.description,
                          color: local!brandingMap.TertiaryTextColor,
                          size: "STANDARD"
                        )
                      }
                    )
                  },
                  padding: "STANDARD",
                  shape: local!brandingMap.CardShape,
                  /* Link to be enabled after individual screens are built */
                  link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_safeLink"(
                    label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Link" & fv!index),
                    uri: fv!item.link,
                    openLinkIn: "SAME_TAB"
                  ),
                  showBorder: local!brandingMap.CardShowBorder,
                  showShadow: local!brandingMap.CardShowShadow,
                  style: local!brandingMap.CardBackgroundColor
                )
              )
            )
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(width: "EXTRA_NARROW")
        }
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
        columns: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(width: "EXTRA_NARROW"),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
            contents: {
              rule!CMGT_PortalPage_FAQ(brandingMap: local!brandingMap)
            }
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(width: "EXTRA_NARROW")
        }
      )
    },
    description: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:3e338114-2801-4c76-93c1-c4da056ad02c",
    brandingMap: local!brandingMap,
    showHeader: true(),
    headerImage: local!brandingMap.HomeHeaderImage
  )
)
